OutputChatConfirm.Title: Enable Output to Chat for All Conditions?
OutputChatConfirm.Content: Click 'Yes' to enable 'Output to Chat' on all Conditions

ConditionLab.NoReference: --No Reference Entry-- (Drag a Document into this field to set)

SortDirectionSave.Title: Save Mapping with Sort Direction?
SortDirectionSave.Content: Click 'Yes' to save the Condition Lab map with the current sort direction. Click 'No' to cancel Saving.

ConditionLab.BadReference: Could not build a link to the dropped content (actor, item, journal etc)

MacroConfig.Title: Macro Configuration
MacroConfig.Heading: Macros to Execute
MacroConfig.Description: Select a macro to execute when this condition is added to or removed from a token/actor

TriggerConfig.Title: Trigger Configuration
TriggerConfig.Heading: Triggers
TriggerConfig.Description: Triggers that Apply or Remove this Condition

OptionConfig.Title: Option Configuration
OptionConfig.Heading: Options

SpecialStatusEffects.Heading: Special Status Effects
SpecialStatusEffects.Description: Special Effects applied using native Foundry functionality.

BlindToken.Label: Blind Token
BlindToken.Notes: When applied, this Condition will also cause the token to be blinded

MarkInvisible.Label: Mark Invisible
MarkInvisible.Notes: When applied, this Condition will cause the affected Token to marked as Invisible

SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Title: Override Existing Condition for this Status Effect?
SpecialStatusEffectOverride.Content:
Another Condition ({existingCondition}) is already setup to apply this special Status Effect: {statusEffect}.

If you click 'Yes' and Save this Condition's Options you will override that existing mapping.

OptionConfig.SaveNote: Note: Clicking Save will Save Condition Lab Mapping

Warnings.ApplyCondition: applyCondition was replaced with addCondition. Please update your code.

ENHANCED_CONDITIONS.MapMismatch: This map does not match your game system and may not work as expected.

Failed.NoToken: Apply Condition failed. No token provided
Failed.NoCondition: Apply Condition failed. Could not find condition:
Failed.NoIcon: Apply Condition failed. Could not find icon.
Failed.AlreadyActive: is already active. Apply Condition failed

Failed.NoToken: Get Conditions failed. No entity provided and none could be found automatically
Failed.NoCondition: Get Conditions failed. No Condition Map found
Failed.NoResults: Get Conditions failed. No Conditions found on Actor/Token

Failed.NoToken: Remove Condition failed. No token provided
Failed.NoCondition: Remove Condition failed. Could not find condition with name:
Failed.NoIcon: Remove Condition failed. Could not find icon
Failed.NotActive: is not active on token. Remove Condition failed.

Failed.NoToken: Remove Conditions failed. No token/s provided
Failed.NoCondition: Remove Conditions failed. There is no active Condition Map

Lab.Title: Condition Lab
Lab.Hint: Provides the ability to map Conditions to Status Effect icons

Import.NoFile: You did not upload a data file!

Lab.ConfirmDeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this row?
Lab.RestoreDefaultsContent:
Are you sure you want to restore this mapping to defaults?

If you save, this change will be permanent.
Lab.ResetFormContent:
Are you sure you want to reset the form?

You will lose any unsaved changes.
Lab.SaveFailed: Condition Lab failed to Save and Close

Options.Title: Options:
Options.Overlay.Label: Overlay
Options.RemoveOthers.Label: Remove Others
Options.OutputChat.Label: Output to Chat
Options.MarkDefeated.Label: Mark Defeated
Options.Overlay.Title: Condition is an overlay
Options.RemoveOthers.Title: Remove other conditions when this one is applied
Options.MarkDefeated.Title: Mark matching combatants defeated when this condition is applied
Options.OutputChat.Title: Output this condition to chat when added/removed

MIGRATION.Title: Condition Lab & Triggler: CUB Settings Migration
MIGRATION.Content: CUB settings have been detected, would you like to import these settings? This choice will overwrite CLT's settings. Your CUB settings won't be affected.

EnhancedConditions.CoreIconsH: A copy of the core status icons
EnhancedConditions.SystemH: A reference to the game system. Defaults to other if not known to the module
EnhancedConditions.OutputCombatH: On each round of Combat, output any conditions for the current combatant to chat
EnhancedConditions.DefaultMapsH: Module-provided maps of conditions to icons
EnhancedConditions.RemoveDefaultEffectsH: Remove existing status effect icons from token HUD
EnhancedConditions.DefaultOutputChatH: Output all default conditions to chat
EnhancedConditions.MapTypeH: Condition map type currently in use -- default, custom or other
EnhancedConditions.SuppressPreventativeSaveReminderH: Suppress the reminder to save the Condition Lab to prevent issues (eg. if user has already done so)
EnhancedConditions.MigrationVersionH: Version of CUB for which migration was last performed
EnhancedConditions.ShowSortDirectionDialogH: Whether or not to show the confirmation dialog for saving the sort direction.

TokenUtility.TokenEffectSizeH: Sets the size for token effect icons on the token. Numbers represent the amount of effect icons to show (X * Y). Default: Small - 5x5

Triggler.TriggersH: A trigger-management system for token/actor attribute changes

SceneControls.Name: Scene Controls Shortcuts
SceneControls.Hint: Adds two buttons to the Token Controls to open the Condition Lab or Triggler windows. Note that you can also open those by setting keybindings instead of using this setting.

TRIGGLER.TriggerMismatch: These triggers do not match your game system and may not work as expected.

ActorProperty.Label: Actor Update Property
ActorProperty.Note: Set the property path to use for Actor updates. The path is relative to the update object passed to the updateActor hook. Note that this is required if Token Update Property is not set.

ActorProperty2.Label: Actor Comparison Property
ActorProperty2.Note: Optionally set a second property to compare the first one against--this path is relative to the Actor object itself

TokenProperty.Label: Token Update Property
TokenProperty.Note: Set the property path to use for Token updates--the path is relative to the update object passed to the updateToken hook. Note that this is required if Actor Update Property is not set.

TokenProperty2.Label: Token Comparison Property
TokenProperty2.Note: Optionally set a second property to compare the first one against--this path is relative to the Token object itself

Property.Hint: The path to the updated property to listen for. The Actor and Token Entry Point values tell Triggler where to look for each entity type

OperatorValue.Heading: Operator & Value
OperatorValue.Note: Always required. The operator and value apply to both Actor and Token Properties set above

Name.Label: Trigger Name
Name.Warning: Name is required for advanced triggers!
